fullplot: After devoted family father Stephen's daughter Sophie complains about unwanted intimacy with him, without wanting the family to break up, her mother Liz agrees to an experimental deal. Stephan goes in residential therapy, with a prospect to return home afterward. It's a painful experience, but it works to all three's ultimate satisfaction.

title: Forgiven
